name: Baolau
tagline: Information and ticket booking service to travel by air, rail, bus and ferry in Asia
description:
Baolau is the leading multi-transport travel search engine in Asia.

We love traveling and are passionate about developing a platform that can help travelers find their way in China, Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, Thailand, Myanmar, Malaysia, Indonesia and Philippines, compare transport options and book tickets easily in few minutes. To achieve this, we cooperate with the major transportation providers in the region to integrate accurate information of schedules and prices, and make online booking accessible to everybody.
